sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function Card(props) { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [image, setImage] = useState(); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { let url = 'https://storage.googleapis.com/wineshop-assets/' const result = await axios.get(url +"wine-shop.json" ); const response = await axios.get("https://storage.googleapis.com/wineshop-assets/wine-bottles/" + result.data[0].image) setData(result.data); setImage(response.config.url) console.log(result.data); } fetchData() }, []); return ( <>
filter

Delivery info

Total

{result.data.length}

price

{data.map(item => (

{item.no}

{item.name}

Bottle

$ {item.cost.bottle}

Case

$ {item.cost.case}

{/*

Case

$ {item.cost.case}

*/}
)) }
) } export default Card
